Released in May, 2021. You can use calls from the 4.x API to access all of your resources that you created in Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API 3.

Beginning in 2021, the Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API uses OAuth 2 for API account authentication. Apple Search Ads users no longer use API certificates to manage access to their Search Ads accounts. For more information, see
To make calls to the Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API with OAuth, see
